value.message: updates for nuget versions
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Remove LayoutJson from worksheet templates

This commit removes the JSON validation logic for the `LayoutJson` property in the `WorksheetTemplatesController`, allowing templates to be created and edited without requiring a JSON layout. The input fields for `LayoutJson` have been removed from the `Create.cshtml` and `Edit.cshtml` forms, and its display has been eliminated from the `Details.cshtml` view.

Additionally, a new foreign key relationship has been established between `Worksheet` and `WorksheetTemplate` in `ApplicationDbContext.cs`, with `DeleteBehavior.SetNull` to handle deletions gracefully. The `LayoutJson` property has been removed from the `WorksheetTemplate` entity, and corresponding migration files have been added to update the database schema.

The logging service has been updated to log prompt templates directly from the `WorksheetGenerationRequest`, and the `OpenAILlmService` now uses these templates directly. Mapping extensions have also been adjusted to exclude the `LayoutJson` property.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
feat: Enhance worksheet template system with prompt templates

- Updated webpack configuration to include additional asset types (woff, woff2) in the assets manifest.
- Modified assets-manifest.json to reflect logical asset paths with leading slashes for .NET compatibility.
- Added comprehensive documentation for the new prompt template system, detailing available substitution tokens and usage examples.
- Created migration to add SystemPromptTemplate and UserPromptTemplate columns to the WorksheetTemplates table, ensuring backward compatibility by initializing existing templates with null values.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message: feat: Remove unused tools for CSV import and database check
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Implement OpenAI LLM Service with logging and worksheet generation capabilities

- Added OpenAILlmService class for generating educational worksheets using OpenAI.
- Implemented methods for generating prompts based on worksheet types.
- Integrated logging service for tracking LLM interactions and errors.
- Created ILlmLoggingService interface for logging requests and responses.
- Developed PowerShell script for managing LLM logs, including info, listing, cleaning, and analyzing logs.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message: feat: Implement Serilog logging with configuration and cleanup support
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message: feat: Enhance worksheet generation with configuration-driven options and improved dropdowns
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Add migrations for worksheet generation metadata and update metadata fields

- Created migration to rename ContentJson to ContentMarkdown and add new columns: ConfidenceScore, EstimatedDurationMinutes, HasAnswerKey, QuestionCount, RenderedHtml, TokensUsed, and Warnings to the Worksheets table.
- Added a second migration file for updating worksheet metadata fields with an empty Up and Down method.
- Implemented a DatabaseCheck tool to verify database connection and display worksheet statistics.
- Added SQL script for debugging worksheets, including checks for existing worksheets and schema information.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
feat: Implement comprehensive Admin area with CRUD functionality and DataTables integration

- Added Admin area documentation detailing features, structure, and navigation.
- Completed CRUD views for CommonCoreStandards and WorksheetTemplates.
- Partially completed CRUD views for Worksheets, ApiKeys, ApiUsage, and WorksheetExports.
- Fixed DataTables AJAX integration issues across all controllers.
- Modernized the build system using npm and webpack for optimized asset management.
- Added DataTables.js usage guide for easy implementation in tables.
- Implemented database models for a worksheet generator system, including CommonCoreStandard and BloomLevel.
- Enhanced ApplicationUser model with education-specific fields and activity tracking.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Implement Worksheet Template Service and related CRUD functionality

- Added WorksheetTemplateService for managing worksheet templates.
- Created IWorksheetTemplateService interface for service abstraction.
- Implemented mapping extensions for WorksheetTemplate and related view models.
- Defined view models for creating, updating, and displaying worksheet templates.
- Established query parameters and service result models for consistent API responses.
- Documented service layer architecture and usage examples in README.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Add Worksheet Templates management views and functionality

- Implemented Delete, Details, Edit, and Index views for Worksheet Templates.
- Added form validation and user feedback for creating and editing worksheets.
- Enhanced the Index view with DataTables for better data management.
- Introduced a confirmation modal for deletion actions.
- Created a new Create view for adding worksheets with detailed input fields.
- Added JavaScript enhancements for admin dashboard interactions and alerts.
- Updated _ViewImports and _ViewStart for consistent layout and tag helpers.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Add migration to fix seed data dates and implement worksheet generator database models

- Created migration `20250620015321_FixSeedDataDates` to update the CreatedAt and UpdatedAt fields for worksheet templates.
- Added comprehensive database models for the worksheet generator system, including ApplicationUser, CommonCoreStandard, BloomLevel, WorksheetTemplate, Worksheet, WorksheetExport, ApiKey, and ApiUsage.
- Documented database implementation details, including model purposes, features, performance optimizations, data integrity, seed data, and migration information in WORKSHEET_DATABASE_README.md.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Implement Identity Management Features

- Added AccountController for user account and profile management.
- Created ApplicationUser model extending IdentityUser with additional properties.
- Set up ApplicationDbContext for Identity and custom entities.
- Added initial migration for Identity tables.
- Created views for user dashboard and profile management.
- Implemented validation scripts for forms.
- Updated _ViewImports and _ViewStart for Identity area.
- Enhanced login partial view for user greeting and management links.

value.message:
feat: Add webpack manifest plugin and asset management

- Updated package.json to include webpack-manifest-plugin for asset management.
- Enhanced webpack configuration for development and production to generate an assets manifest.
- Created HTML helper extensions for rendering script and stylesheet tags based on the asset manifest.
- Implemented an AssetsService to retrieve asset paths from the manifest.
- Added a model for the assets manifest to facilitate JSON deserialization.
- Introduced asset management in Razor views using new HTML helpers.
- Established a comprehensive documentation for GitHub Copilot usage and project guidelines.
